segments.text: My attention is drawn to the center of the kitchen, near the cupboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A small boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into an open cabinet, clearly targeting the "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's actually got his hand inside, pulling out a cookie!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Another child, a girl, stands nearby, eagerly waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand outstretched, ready to receive her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are operating with such a focused, mischievous intent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way they coordinate without a word is quite impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a classic secret cookie raid in progress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't tip over with all his stretching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The joy on their faces, even implied, must be immense.
segments.speaker: PAR
